description: Completed a Bachelor's degree in Social Policy and Education with a concentration in Human Development
Completed a Master's degree in Computer Science
Presented with a Career Award for sustained outstanding student mentorship in Computer Science courses
Awarded a Computer Science research fellowship to conduct educational technology development and research identity-centered, equitable curriculum

Published my Master's project! For my research on generative AI benefits for educators, I designed and prototyped a classroom management tool that used generative AI in both the development and functionality to explore how agentic tools could empower educators to implement equity-focused pedagogical approaches backed by the learning sciences
Co-authored a paper on the context, implementation, and impact of generative AI education and submitted it to AAAI's 2026 Education Symposium
